title: MD
biography: Tadamitsu Kishimoto  is a Japanese immunologist known for research on IgM and cytokines, most famously, interleukin 6.
aiSummary: Tadamitsu Kishimoto is a immunology specialist with an H-index of 160 at Osaka University (Member). Has been published in Nature, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Cell. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
